mapper.select: select cp.id,cp.display_id,cp.cid,cp.pid,cp.display_title, (select count(*) from oj_judge where contest_pid=cp.id and cid=cp.cid and pid =cp.pid and submit_time >= #{startTime}) as total, (select count(*) from oj_judge where contest_pid=cp.id and cid=cp.cid and pid =cp.pid and status=0 and submit_time >= #{startTime}) as accept from ct_contest_problem cp where cp.cid = #{cid} order by cp.display_id asc
